DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether treatment D9421-C 8 week Japanese patient mild moderate active Crohn 's disease improve symptom Crohn 's disease quality life .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study D9421-C 9 mg 15 mg Versus Placebo Japanese Patients With Active Crohn 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Female male age ≥ 18 ≤ 65 year Diagnosis Crohn 's Disease Having ileostomy pouch and/or colostomy Having previous gastric surgery Having know suspected systemic infection
